sqlList: ALTER TABLE `x2_profile` ADD COLUMN `theme` TEXT AFTER `activityFeedOrder`;

INSERT INTO `x2_auth_item` (`bizrule`,`data`,`description`,`name`,`type`) VALUES ('','N;','Delete a credentials record not in use.','CredentialsDelete',0),(NULL,'N;','Administrative credentials access','CredentialsAdmin',1),('return (!$params[\'model\']->getIsInUseBySystem()) && $params[\'model\']->userId == Credentials::SYS_ID;','N;','Delete system-wide credentials that aren\'t in use','CredentialsDeleteSystemwide',1),(NULL,'N;','Set a credentials record as default.','CredentialsSetDefault',0),(NULL,'N;','Set one\'s own credentials','CredentialsSetDefaultOwn',1),('return $params[\'model\']->userId == Credentials::SYS_ID;','N;','Select system-owned credentials.','CredentialsSelectSystemwide',1),('return Yii::app()->getUser()->getId() == $params[\'model\']->userId;','N;','Access to a user\'s own credentials, by the user','CredentialsCreateUpdateOwn',1),('return in_array($params[\'userId\'],Credentials::$sysUseId) && $params[\'model\']->userId == Credentials::SYS_ID;','N;','Set system-wide default credentials, i.e. for bulk email.','CredentialsSetDefaultSystemwide',1),(NULL,'N;','Select a credentials record to use as default.','CredentialsSelect',1),('return $params[\'model\']->userId == Yii::app()->user->id;','N;','Select one\'s own credentials','CredentialsSelectOwn',1),('return $params[\'model\']->private == 0;','N;','Select other users\' credentials that are designated not-private','CredentialsSelectNonPrivate',1),('return Yii::app()->getUser()->getId() == $params[\'model\']->userId;','N;','Delete one\'s own credentials.','CredentialsDeleteOwn',1),(NULL,'N;','Create or update credentials','CredentialsCreateUpdate',0),('return $params[\'model\']->userId == Credentials::SYS_ID;','N;','Create or update system-wide credentials','CredentialsCreateUpdateSystemwide',1);

INSERT INTO `x2_auth_item_child` (`child`,`parent`) VALUES ('CredentialsSelect','CredentialsSelectSystemwide'),('CredentialsDeleteSystemwide','CredentialsAdmin'),('CredentialsDelete','CredentialsDeleteSystemwide'),('CredentialsSetDefaultSystemwide','CredentialsAdmin'),('CredentialsSelect','CredentialsSelectNonPrivate'),('CredentialsSetDefault','CredentialsSetDefaultSystemwide'),('CredentialsSelect','CredentialsSelectOwn'),('CredentialsSelectNonPrivate','CredentialsAdmin'),('CredentialsDeleteOwn','DefaultRole'),('CredentialsSetDefault','CredentialsSetDefaultOwn'),('CredentialsCreateUpdate','CredentialsCreateUpdateOwn'),('CredentialsSelectOwn','DefaultRole'),('CredentialsSelectSystemwide','DefaultRole'),('CredentialsAdmin','GeneralAdminSettingsTask'),('CredentialsCreateUpdateOwn','DefaultRole'),('AdminUpdater','GeneralAdminSettingsTask'),('CredentialsSetDefaultOwn','CredentialsSelect'),('CredentialsDelete','CredentialsDeleteOwn'),('CredentialsCreateUpdateSystemwide','CredentialsAdmin'),('CredentialsCreateUpdate','CredentialsCreateUpdateSystemwide');

changelog:
X2Engine 3.5

Point release 3.5.2: 9/20/2013

Changes in 3.5.2

  • Fully-configurable batch timeout setting controls how much actual time can be spent in campaign emailing and cron events
  • Attribute replacement now works in the "Send a Test Email" feature of Campaigns
  • Long-overdue data validation in Role creator
  • New in X2Flow (Professional Edition only)
    • X2Flow email actions can be configured to send using SMTP accounts stored through the credentials manager (see: "Manage Apps" in the user menu)
    • Variable replacement in the X2Flow email actions works for arbitrary models
    • Insertable attribute menus in X2Flow email actions automatically match those of the model type in the trigger
    • New "unsubscribe" link short-code for X2Flow email bodies
  • Fixed Bugs:
    • 206: Name improperly parsed/generated from email headers
    • 243: User Report
    • 252: X2Flow Issue with comparing two attributes
    • 296: Send a test email to actual contacts
    • 308: Cannot add "administrator" as a child of "DefaultRole". A loop has been detected.
    • 311: DbCommand failed to execute the SQL statement: SQLSTATE[HY000]: General error: 1366 Incorrect decimal value: '' for column 'dealvalue
